Note: The BBC changed the way it calculated its spend figures from 2005 onwards. The figures for 2002 – 2004 are based on cost per hour averages, while those for 2005 - 2008 are actual spend figures. Comparisons over the period 2003-2008 should therefore be exercised with caution. Spend excludes Gaelic and Welsh language programming but includes some spend on Irish language programming by the BBC.
